name: Silent Hill: Ascension
description:
WATCH NEW SCENES & IMPACT CANON EVERY DAY
Join live daily at 9pm ET / 6pm PT or watch anytime on demand. The characters’ fates are in your hands. Experience FREE now!

A GENVID INTERACTIVE SERIES
SILENT HILL: Ascension is a thrilling new, Genvid Interactive Streaming Series where YOU, along with the rest of the audience can impact the canon of SILENT HILL.
